content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS)</origin> <pubdate>20130427</pubdate> <title>COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN: Address Points Maintained by County Agencies in Indiana (Indiana Department of Homeland Security, Point Shapefile)</title> <geoform>Vector digital data</geoform> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Indianapolis, Indiana</pubplace> <publish>Indiana Geographic Information Council</publish> </pubinfo> <othercit> This data set was provided to personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) by Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS) personnel. The data set provided was in an ESRI shapefile format, and was named "County_Point_Address.shp." This data represents a preliminary (partial) set of data harvested through the ongoing Data Sharing Initiative program by the Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS) from local government sources in June 2009, and subsequently updated on September 30, 2009, December 2, 2009, December 28, 2009, February 2, 2010, March 5, 2010, April 6, 2010, October 11, 2010, November 19, 2010, March 22, 2011, September 8, 2011, January 30, 2012, June 8, 2012, August 27, 2012, and April 27, 2013. As a preliminary data set, these data have not been completely quality control checked for completeness, accuracy or content and are provided for program demonstration purposes only. These preliminary data are provided "as-is" and are not to be used for any official or business purpose. </othercit> <onlink>http://maps.indiana.edu</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract> COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN is a point shapefile that contains address points maintained by county agencies in Indiana, provided by personnel of Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS) as of June 29, 2009, and subsequently updated on September 30, 2009, December 2, 2009, December 28, 2009, February 2, 2010, March 5, 2010, April 6, 2010, October 11, 2010, November 19, 2010, March 22, 2011, September 8, 2011, January 30, 2012, June 8, 2012, August 27, 2012, and April 27, 2013. This data set was provided by IDHS in ESRI shapefile format and was named "County_Point_Address.shp." This data set was compiled by IDHS as part of the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative between IGIC, Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS), Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) and participating Indiana counties to provide the most accurate framework data (including address points, street centerlines, land parcels, and governmental boundaries) for the citizens of Indiana. More information is available at the following Web URL: http://www.igic.org/news/index.php?itemid=265 </abstract> <purpose> This data set was developed to provide accurate framework data (including address points, street centerlines, land parcels, and governmental boundaries)for Indiana, as part of the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative. </purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20130427</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Based on the publication date (harvest date) for the FIFTEENTH update for the source shapefile "County_Point_Address.shp."</current> <accconst>This file is available to anyone contingent on current freedom of information statutes in the state of Indiana.</accconst> <useconst> INDIANA GEOLOGICAL SURVEY DATA DISCLAIMER  This preliminary data set is provided by Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey, and contains data believed to be accurate; however, a degree of error is inherent in all data. This preliminary data are distributed "AS-IS" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including but not limited to warranties of suitability of a particular purpose or use. This preliminary data are not to be used for any official or business purpose. No attempt has been made in either the designed format or production of these data to define the limits or jurisdiction of any federal, state, or local government.  These data are intended for use only at the published scale or smaller and are for reference purposes only. They are not to be construed as a legal document or survey instrument. A detailed on-the-ground survey and historical analysis of a single site may differ from these data.  CREDIT  It is requested, but not required, that the IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative between IGIC, Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS), Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) and participating Indiana counties be cited in any products generated from this data set. If citing, the following source citation language should be included: [COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN: Address Points Maintained by County Agencies in Indiana, Fifteenth Harvest (Indiana Department of Homeland Security, Point Shapefile), 20130427]  WARRANTY  Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405-2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.  LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY  Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana Geographic Information Council (IGIC), Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS), Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey, and the Indiana counties participaing in this program share no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss, including any claims by a third party. The IndianaMap Data Sharing Initiative between IGIC, Indiana Office of Technology (IOT), Indiana Geographic Information Office (GIO), Indiana Department of Homeland Security (IDHS), Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) and participating Indiana counties to provide the most accurate framework data (including address points, street centerlines, land parcels, and governmental boundaries) for the citizens of Indiana. </othercit> </citeinfo> </srccite> <typesrc>ESRI shapefile</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20130427</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>Based on the attribute value named "LOADDATE" found in the source shapefile named "County_Point_Address.shp"</srccurr> </srctime> <srccitea>County_Point_Address.shp</srccitea> <srccontr>Address points for participating Indiana counties</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc> IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Point_Address.shp" from IDHS personnel (Roger Koelpin) on June 29, 2009. "County_Point_Address.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions. </procdesc> <srcused>County_Point_Address.shp</srcused> <procdate>20090629</procdate> <srcprod>COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP</srcprod> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>Indiana Geological Survey</cntorg> <cntper>Chris Dintaman</cntper> </cntorgp> <cntpos>Geologist, GIS Specialist</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>611 North Walnut Grove</address> <city>Bloomington</city> <state>Indiana</state> <postal>47405-2208</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>812-856-5654</cntvoice> <cntfax>812-855-2862</cntfax> <cntemail>cdintama@indiana.edu</cntemail> <hours>0800 to 1700 Eastern Standard Time</hours> <cntinst>Monday through Friday, except holidays</cntinst> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> <procstep> <procdesc> IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Point_Address.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on September 30, 2009. "County_Point_Address.shp" was loaded into ESRI ArcMap 9.3.1 and the data were examined for completeness. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanant_," "Source_Fea," "Source_D_1," "Data_Secur," "Distributi," "Local_Addr," "Address_Ty," "Collection," "Current_St," and "Empty." Also, data provided by GIS personnel of Wayne County, Indiana that were geographically located in Ohio were also deleted (19,225 records). The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions. </procdesc> <srcused>County_Point_Address.shp</srcused> <procdate>20090930</procdate> <srcprod>COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP</srcprod> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>Indiana Geological Survey</cntorg> <cntper>Chris Dintaman</cntper> </cntorgp> <cntpos>Geologist, GIS Specialist</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>611 North Walnut Grove</address> <city>Bloomington</city> <state>Indiana</state> <postal>47405-2208</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>812-856-5654</cntvoice> <cntfax>812-855-2862</cntfax> <cntemail>cdintama@indiana.edu</cntemail> <hours>0800 to 1700 Eastern Standard Time</hours> <cntinst>Monday through Friday, except holidays</cntinst> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> <procstep> <procdesc> IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Point_Address.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on December 2, 2009. Also, data provided by GIS personnel of Wayne County, Indiana that were geographically located in Ohio were also deleted (19,225 records). The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions. Also, there were a total of 636 records that were deleted that were completely mislocated outside the boundary of Indiana from various counties within Indiana. </procdesc> <srcused>County_Point_Address.shp</srcused> <procdate>20100305</procdate> <srcprod>COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP</srcprod> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>Indiana Geological Survey</cntorg> <cntper>Chris Dintaman</cntper> </cntorgp> <cntpos>Geologist, GIS Specialist</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>611 North Walnut Grove</address> <city>Bloomington</city> <state>Indiana</state> <postal>47405-2208</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>812-856-5654</cntvoice> <cntfax>812-855-2862</cntfax> <cntemail>cdintama@indiana.edu</cntemail> <hours>0800 to 1700 Eastern Standard Time</hours> <cntinst>Monday through Friday, except holidays</cntinst> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> <procstep> <procdesc> IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "County_Point_Address.shp" from IGIC personnel (Phill Worrall) on April 6, 2010. The following fields were deleted from the attribute table; "Permanant_Identifier," "Source_FeatureID," "Source_DataDesc," and "Current_Status." Also, data provided by GIS personnel of Wayne County, Indiana that were geographically located in Ohio were also deleted (19,225 records). The shapefile was then renamed to COUNTY_ADDRESS_POINTS_IDHS_IN.SHP to conform to IGS naming conventions.
